WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please re-file this on GitHub if it still repros when we have a language service again.
WorkItem.Description:
Calling LanguageService.clearSemanticCache() will throw a null pointer exception when a language service is first constructed due to the underlying TypeScript compiler not yet being lazily-constructed.  A null check to test this.compiler in TypeScript.Services.LanguageServiceCompiler.cleanupSemanticCache() would be one way of resolving this issue.

First discussed here:
https://typescript.codeplex.com/discussions/547482
